description: Make cauliflower gnocchi from scratch with this easy recipe. It's a fresh spin on the cheesy Italian classic cacio e pepe.
keywords: Cacio E Pepe Cauliflower Gnocchi With Gremolata
name: Cacio E Pepe Cauliflower Gnocchi With Gremolata Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine zest and parsley in a bowl. Divide gnocchi among bowls and top with gremolata. Serve with lemon wedges.
